column6: - Any old heroes can save the day. The Surfer and Dawn are out to save the day AFTER. - As everything goes kablooey, find out why the fate of every possible tomorrow rests... in a wind-up toy monkey. - No. Really. One of those creepy things with the cymbals. - Also, after 48 years in comics, one of the most under appreciated characters in the entire Marvel Universe FINALLY gets a name. Have your handbooks ready!
